metadata.title: CVE-2017-11225 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Adobe Flash Player 27.0.0.183 and earlierversions. This vulnerability is an instance of a use after freevulnerability in the Primetime SDK metadata functionality. The mismatchbetween an old and a new object can provide an attacker with unintendedmemory access -- potentially leading to code corruption, control-flowhijack, or an information leak attack. Successful exploitation could leadto arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11225` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 27.0.0.187ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 27.0.0.187ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '27.0.0.187ubuntu0.16.04.1').
